title: TKT-183.1: Recency Decay Curve Analysis â€” Candidate Rates for Founder
description: Compute candidate exponential decay rates for Factor 3 (Recency Decay). Analyze how tournament relevance degrades over time. Present 3-5 candidate decay curves with supporting evidence for Founder selection (per Decision #5). Use IPL 2023-2025 baseline. Output: decay curve comparison chart + recommendation memo.

founder_validation.feedback: Founder Decision: Exponential decay with 4-year half-life approved. Aligns with mega auction cycles, honors 2023 structural break.
